text: Ara prastuta kara tadera sathe yud'dhera jan'ya ya'i kichu sangraha karate para nijera sakti samarthyera madhye theke ebam palita ghora theke, yena prabhaba pare allahara sutrudera upara ebam tomadera satrudera upara ara taderake chara an'yan'yadera upara o yaderake tomara jana na; allaha taderake cenena. Bastutah ya kichu tomara byaya karabe allahara rahe, ta tomara paripurnabhabe phire pabe ebam tomadera kona haka apurna thakabe na.
